properties.description: please refer to the NSIP Entity Message Topic Requirements  documentation

source: #### If dev or test, limiting the number of output rows and anonymisation of the sensitive fields is required.

# from notebookutils import mssparkutils
# storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')

# is_dev_or_test_env = 'dev' in storage_account or 'test' in storage_account

# # limiting the number of output to 20 rows for dev environment
# max_limit = 20 if 'dev' in storage_account else 100000000

# spark.sql(f"SET MAX_LIMIT = {max_limit}")

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_data

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
	CAST(CASE WHEN T1.Migrated = '0' 
		 THEN T1.CaseNodeID
		 ELSE T1.CaseID
	END	AS INT)												AS caseId,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.CaseReference = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.CaseReference
	END 													AS caseReference,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.CaseNodeID = 'nan'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.CaseNodeID
	END 													AS caseNodeId,	
	T1.projectName			 								AS projectName,	
		CASE
		WHEN T1.Summary = 'nan'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.Summary
	END 													AS projectDescription,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.Decision = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE LOWER(T1.Decision) 
	END 													AS decision,
	CASE WHEN LOWER(T1.ProjectStatus) = 'published' 
		 THEN 'published'
		 ELSE 'unpublished'
	END														AS publishStatus,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.ExamTimetablePublishStatus = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.ExamTimetablePublishStatus
	END 						 							AS examTimetablePublishStatus,
	T1.Sector 												AS sector,
	T1.ProjectType 											AS projectType,
	LOWER(T1.ODTSourceSystem)								AS sourceSystem,
	LOWER(REPLACE(REPLACE(T1.Stage,'-', '_'),' ', '_'))		AS stage,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.ProjectLocation = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.ProjectLocation
	END 													AS projectLocation,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.ProjectEmailAddress = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.ProjectEmailAddress
	END 													AS projectEmailAddress,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.Region = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE LOWER(
		REPLACE(
			REPLACE(
				REPLACE(T1.Region,' ', '_'),
			'[', ''),
		']', ''))
	END 													AS regions,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.Transboundary = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.Transboundary
	END 													AS transboundary,
	CAST(T1.Easting AS INT)									AS easting,
	CAST(T1.Northing AS INT)								AS northing,

	CASE
		WHEN T1.DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject
	END 													AS datePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite
	END 													AS dateProjectAppearsOnWebsite,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.AnticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.AnticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific
	END 													AS anticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific,
		CASE
		WHEN T1.AnticipatedDateOfSubmission = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.AnticipatedDateOfSubmission
	END 													AS anticipatedDateOfSubmission,
		CASE
		WHEN T1.ScreeningOpinionSought = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.ScreeningOpinionSought
	END 													AS screeningOpinionSought,
		CASE
		WHEN T1.ScreeningOpinionIssued = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.ScreeningOpinionIssued
	END 													AS screeningOpinionIssued,
		CASE
		WHEN T1.ScopingOpinionSought = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.ScopingOpinionSought
	END 													AS scopingOpinionSought,
		CASE
		WHEN T1.ScopingOpinionIssued = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.ScopingOpinionIssued
	END 													AS scopingOpinionIssued,
		CASE
		WHEN T1.Section46Notification = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.Section46Notification
	END 													AS section46Notification,
		CASE
		WHEN T1.DateOfDCOSubmission = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DateOfDCOSubmission
	END 													AS dateOfDCOSubmission,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision
	END 													AS deadlineForAcceptanceDecision,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DateOfDCOAcceptance = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DateOfDCOAcceptance
	END 													AS dateOfDCOAcceptance,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DateOfNonAcceptance = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DateOfNonAcceptance
	END 													AS dateOfNonAcceptance,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen
	END 													AS dateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose
	END 													AS dateOfRelevantRepresentationClose,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose
	END 													AS extensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DateRRepAppearOnWebsite = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DateRRepAppearOnWebsite
	END 													AS dateRRepAppearOnWebsite,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DateIAPIDue = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DateIAPIDue
	END 													AS  dateIAPIDue, ---NEW
	CASE
		WHEN T1.Rule6LetterPublishDate = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.Rule6LetterPublishDate
	END 													AS rule6LetterPublishDate,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.PreliminaryMeetingStartDate = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.PreliminaryMeetingStartDate
	END 													AS preliminaryMeetingStartDate,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.NotificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.NotificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM
	END 													AS notificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.NotificationDateForEventsDeveloper = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.NotificationDateForEventsDeveloper
	END 													AS notificationDateForEventsDeveloper,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DateSection58NoticeReceived = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DateSection58NoticeReceived
	END 													AS dateSection58NoticeReceived,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.ConfirmedStartOfExamination = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.ConfirmedStartOfExamination
	END 													AS confirmedStartOfExamination,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.Rule8LetterPublishDate = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.Rule8LetterPublishDate
	END 													AS rule8LetterPublishDate,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DeadlineForCloseOfExamination = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DeadlineForCloseOfExamination
	END 													AS deadlineForCloseOfExamination,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DateTimeExaminationEnds = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DateTimeExaminationEnds
	END 													AS dateTimeExaminationEnds,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate
	END 													AS stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation
	END 													AS deadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DateOfRecommendations = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DateOfRecommendations
	END 													AS dateOfRecommendations,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline
	END 													AS stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DeadlineForDecision = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DeadlineForDecision
	END 													AS deadlineForDecision,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.ConfirmedDateOfDecision = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.ConfirmedDateOfDecision
	END 													AS confirmedDateOfDecision,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline
	END 													AS stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.JRPeriodEndDate = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.JRPeriodEndDate
	END 													AS jRPeriodEndDate,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DateProjectWithdrawn = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DateProjectWithdrawn
	END 													AS dateProjectWithdrawn,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.OperationsLeadID = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.OperationsLeadID
	END 													AS operationsLeadId,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.OperationsManagerID = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.OperationsManagerID
	END 													AS operationsManagerId,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.CaseManagerID = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.CaseManagerID
	END 													AS caseManagerId,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.NsipOfficerID = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.NsipOfficerID
	END 													AS nsipOfficerIds,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.NsipAdministrationOfficerID = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.NsipAdministrationOfficerID
	END 													AS nsipAdministrationOfficerIds,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.LeadInspectorID = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.LeadInspectorID
	END 													AS leadInspectorId,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.InspectorID = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.InspectorID
	END 													AS inspectorIds,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.EnvironmentalServicesOfficerId = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.EnvironmentalServicesOfficerId
	END 													AS environmentalServicesOfficerId,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.LegalOfficerID = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.LegalOfficerID
	END 													AS legalOfficerId,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.ApplicantID = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.ApplicantID
	END 													AS applicantId,
	CASE WHEN T1.WelshLanguage = 'YES' 
		 THEN TRUE
		 ELSE FALSE
	END														AS welshLanguage,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.MapZoomLevel = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE LOWER(T1.MapZoomLevel)
	END 													AS mapZoomLevel,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.SoS = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.SoS
	END 													AS secretaryOfState,
	T1.Migrated 											AS migrationStatus,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationStart = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationStart
	END 													AS dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationStart,
	CASE
		WHEN T1.DateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationClose = 'None'
		THEN NULL
		ELSE T1.DateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationClose
	END 													AS dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationClose

FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_data_dim T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_inspector_cases_dim T2 
	ON T1.CaseReference=T2.CaseReference 
		AND T2.IsActive='Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_contact_information_dim T3
	ON  T1.ApplicantEmailAddress = T3.Email  
		AND CAST(T1.CaseCreatedDate AS date) = CAST(T3.CaseCreatedDate AS date)
		AND T3.IsActive='Y'

-- LIMIT ${MAX_LIMIT}

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE odw_curated_db.nsip_data

USING delta

AS

SELECT 	
    *
    -- caseId,
    -- caseReference,
    -- projectName,
    -- projectDescription,
    -- decision,
    -- publishStatus,
    -- sector,
    -- projectType,
    -- sourceSystem,
    -- stage,
    -- projectLocation,
    -- projectEmailAddress,
    -- regions,
    -- transboundary,
    -- easting,
    -- northing,
    -- datePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject,
    -- dateProjectAppearsOnWebsite,
    -- anticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific,
    -- anticipatedDateOfSubmission,
    -- screeningOpinionSought,
    -- screeningOpinionIssued,
    -- scopingOpinionSought,
    -- scopingOpinionIssued,
    -- section46Notification,
    -- dateOfDCOSubmission,
    -- deadlineForAcceptanceDecision,
    -- dateOfDCOAcceptance,
    -- dateOfNonAcceptance,
    -- dateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen,
    -- dateOfRelevantRepresentationClose,
    -- extensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose,
    -- dateRRepAppearOnWebsite,
    -- dateIAPIDue,
    -- rule6LetterPublishDate,
    -- preliminaryMeetingStartDate,
    -- notificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM,
    -- notificationDateForEventsDeveloper,
    -- dateSection58NoticeReceived,
    -- confirmedStartOfExamination,
    -- rule8LetterPublishDate,
    -- deadlineForCloseOfExamination,
    -- dateTimeExaminationEnds,
    -- stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate,
    -- deadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation,
    -- dateOfRecommendations,
    -- stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline,
    -- deadlineForDecision,
    -- confirmedDateOfDecision,
    -- stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline,
    -- jRPeriodEndDate,
    -- dateProjectWithdrawn,
    -- operationsLeadId,
    -- operationsManagerId,
    -- caseManagerId,
    -- nsipOfficerIds,
    -- nsipAdministrationOfficerIds,
    -- leadInspectorId,
    -- inspectorIds,
    -- environmentalServicesOfficerId,
    -- legalOfficerId,
    -- applicantId,
    -- welshLanguage,
    -- mapZoomLevel,
    -- secretaryOfState,
    -- migrationStatus,
    -- dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationStart,
    -- dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationClose
    
FROM odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_data

WHERE caseId IS NOT NULL;
